long_description: Always have your SureFire flashlight at the ready with this rugged nylon holster. Heavy-duty Cordura(R) nylon ensures long-lasting performance; long retention flap with rip-and-stick closure secures the flashlight. Quick-detach belt loop allows you to attach or remove holster without having to remove your belt; accepts belts up to 3 in. wide. Holster fits the Surefire 6P, G2, D2, A2 and E2D flashlights.
short_description: Always have your SureFire flashlight at the ready with this rugged nylon holster.
